20101203020734.000|20101203020736.000|CCO|US?

20101203020750.000|20101203020752.000|CCO|IN THIS BUILDING.

20101203020755.333|20101203020758.667|CCO|I SEE PIGEONS AND I'M LIKE, WOW.
20101203020758.667|20101203020802.000|CCO|THESE BIRDS THAT THESE GUYS HAD,

20101203020807.000|20101203020808.667|CCO|EVERY TIME THEY WOULD FLY THEY 
20101203020808.667|20101203020810.333|CCO|WOULD LAND ON A BUILDING BUT
